name: Mining Frenzy
description:
Become the richest prospector by exploring, mining and collecting everything!

• MINE & CHOP everything
• EXPLORE & PROGRESS in the WILD WEST
• COLLECT, BUY & EVOLVE to become the richest prospector
• UPGRADE your tools, camp and wagons
• Use SPECIAL SKILLS to destroy and collect unique resources
• No time to play? Let Mr Don do the job for you!
